001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.IPathFormatter;
006import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.IPathSegment;
007import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IResourceLocation;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import java.net.URI;
012import java.util.Collection;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.stream.Stream;
015
016import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
020
021/**
022 * Represents a queryable Metapath model node.
023 */
024public interface INodeItem extends IItem, IPathSegment, INodeItemVisitable {
025
026  /**
027   * Generate a path for this node in the directed node graph, using the provided
028   * path formatter.
029   */
030  @Override
031  String format(IPathFormatter formatter);
032
033  /**
034   * Gets the value of the provided node item.
035   * <p>
036   * If the provided node item is a document, this method get the first child node
037   * item's value, since a document doesn't have a value.
038   *
039   * @param <CLASS>
040   *          the type of the bound object to return
041   * @param item
042   *          the node item to get the value of
043   * @return a bound object
044   * @throws NullPointerException
045   *           if the node item has no associated value
046   */
047  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
048  @NonNull
049  static <CLASS> CLASS toValue(@NonNull INodeItem item) {
050    INodeItem valuedItem;
051    if (item instanceof IDocumentNodeItem) {
052      // get first child item, since the document has no value
053      valuedItem = item.modelItems().findFirst().get();
054    } else {
055      valuedItem = item;
056    }
057    return ObjectUtils.requireNonNull((CLASS) valuedItem.getValue());
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Retrieve the parent node item if it exists.
062   *
063   * @return the parent node item, or {@code null} if this node item has no known
064   *         parent
065   */
066  INodeItem getParentNodeItem();
067
068  /**
069   * Retrieve the parent content node item if it exists. A content node is a
070   * non-document node.
071   *
072   * @return the parent content node item, or {@code null} if this node item has
073   *         no known parent content node item
074   */
075  IModelNodeItem<?, ?> getParentContentNodeItem();
076
077  /**
078   * Get the type of node item this is.
079   *
080   * @return the node item's type
081   */
082  @NonNull
083  NodeItemType getNodeItemType();
084
085  /**
086   * Retrieve the base URI of this node.
087   * <p>
088   * The base URI of a node will be in order of preference:
089   * <ol>
090   * <li>the base URI defined on the node</li>
091   * <li>the base URI defined on the nearest ancestor node</li>
092   * <li>the base URI defined on the document node</li>
093   * <li>{@code null} if the document node is unknown</li>
094   * </ol>
095   *
096   * @return the base URI or {@code null} if it is unknown
097   */
098  URI getBaseUri();
099
100  /**
101   * Get the path for this node item as a Metapath.
102   *
103   * @return the Metapath
104   */
105  @NonNull
106  default String getMetapath() {
107    return toPath(IPathFormatter.METAPATH_PATH_FORMATER);
108  }
109
110  @Override
111  default Stream<? extends INodeItem> getPathStream() {
112    INodeItem parent = getParentNodeItem();
113    return ObjectUtils.notNull(
114        parent == null ? Stream.of(this) : Stream.concat(getParentNodeItem().getPathStream(), Stream.of(this)));
115  }
116
117  /**
118   * Get a stream of all ancestors of this node item. The stream is ordered from
119   * closest to farthest ancestor.
120   *
121   * @return a stream of ancestor node items
122   */
123  @NonNull
124  default Stream<? extends INodeItem> ancestor() {
125    return ancestorsOf(this);
126  }
127
128  /**
129   * Get a stream of this and all ancestors of this node item. The stream is
130   * ordered from self, then closest to farthest ancestor.
131   *
132   * @return a stream of this node followed by all ancestor node items
133   */
134  @NonNull
135  default Stream<? extends INodeItem> ancestorOrSelf() {
136    return ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.concat(Stream.of(this), ancestor()));
137  }
138
139  /**
140   * Get a stream of the ancestors of the provided {@code item}. The stream is
141   * ordered from the closest to farthest ancestor.
142   *
143   * @param item
144   *          the target item to get ancestors for
145   *
146   * @return a stream of all ancestor node items
147   */
148  @NonNull
149  static Stream<? extends INodeItem> ancestorsOf(@NonNull INodeItem item) {
150    INodeItem parent = item.getParentNodeItem();
151    return ObjectUtils.notNull(parent == null ? Stream.empty() : Stream.concat(Stream.of(parent), ancestorsOf(parent)));
152  }
153
154  /**
155   * Get a stream of all descendant model items of this node item. The stream is
156   * ordered from closest to farthest descendants in a depth-first order.
157   *
158   * @return a stream of descendant node items
159   */
160  @NonNull
161  default Stream<? extends INodeItem> descendant() {
162    return decendantsOf(this);
163  }
164
165  /**
166   * Get a stream of all descendant model items of the provided {@code item}. The
167   * stream is ordered from closest to farthest descendants in a depth-first
168   * order.
169   *
170   * @param item
171   *          the target item to get descendants for
172   *
173   * @return a stream of descendant node items
174   */
175  @NonNull
176  static Stream<? extends INodeItem> decendantsOf(@NonNull INodeItem item) {
177    Stream<? extends INodeItem> children = item.modelItems();
178
179    return ObjectUtils.notNull(children.flatMap(child -> {
180      assert child != null;
181      return Stream.concat(Stream.of(child), decendantsOf(child));
182    }));
183  }
184
185  /**
186   * Get a stream of this node, followed by all descendant model items of this
187   * node item. The stream is ordered from closest to farthest descendants in a
188   * depth-first order.
189   *
190   * @return a stream of this node and descendant node items
191   */
192  @NonNull
193  default Stream<? extends INodeItem> descendantOrSelf() {
194    return ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.concat(Stream.of(this), descendant()));
195  }
196
197  /**
198   * Get the flags and value data associated this node. The resulting collection
199   * is expected to be ordered, with the results in document order.
200   * <p>
201   * The resulting collection may be modified, but such modification is not thread
202   * safe
203   *
204   * @return a collection of flags
205   */
206  @NonNull
207  Collection<? extends IFlagNodeItem> getFlags();
208
209  /**
210   * Lookup a flag and value data on this node by it's effective qualified name.
211   *
212   * @param name
213   *          the effective name of the flag
214   * @return the flag with the matching effective name or {@code null} if no match
215   *         was found
216   */
217  @Nullable
218  IFlagNodeItem getFlagByName(@NonNull QName name);
219
220  /**
221   * Get the flags and value data associated with this node as a stream.
222   *
223   * @return the stream of flags or an empty stream if none exist
224   */
225  @SuppressWarnings("null")
226  @NonNull
227  default Stream<? extends IFlagNodeItem> flags() {
228    return getFlags().stream();
229  }
230
231  /**
232   * Get the model items (i.e., fields, assemblies) and value data associated this
233   * node. A given model instance can be multi-valued, so the value of each
234   * instance will be a list. The resulting collection is expected to be ordered,
235   * with the results in document order.
236   * <p>
237   * The resulting collection may be modified, but such modification is not thread
238   * safe
239   *
240   * @return a collection of list(s), with each list containing the items for a
241   *         given model instance
242   */
243  @NonNull
244  Collection<? extends List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> getModelItems();
245
246  /**
247   * Get the collection of model items associated with the instance having the
248   * provided {@code name}.
249   * <p>
250   * The resulting collection may be modified, but such modification is not thread
251   * safe
252   *
253   * @param name
254   *          the instance name to get model items for
255   * @return the sequence of items associated with the named model instance, or an
256   *         empty list if an instance with that name is not present
257   */
258  @NonNull
259  List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> getModelItemsByName(@NonNull QName name);
260
261  /**
262   * Get the model items (i.e., fields, assemblies) and value data associated this
263   * node as a stream.
264   *
265   * @return the stream of model items or an empty stream if none exist
266   */
267  @SuppressWarnings("null")
268  @NonNull
269  default Stream<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> modelItems() {
270    return getModelItems().stream().flatMap(Collection::stream);
271  }
272
273  /**
274   * Get the resource location information for the node, if known.
275   *
276   * @return the resource location information, or {@code null} if not known
277   */
278  @Nullable
279  IResourceLocation getLocation();
280
281  /**
282   * Get the static context to use to query this node item.
283   *
284   * @return the static context
285   */
286  @NonNull
287  StaticContext getStaticContext();
288}
